messageBody:
--- nixj14@... wrote:
> I've been placed in charge of learning the concepts
> of JUnit and
> reporting them back to our team. I've reviewed many
> of the messages
> in this archive and in the extreme progrogramming
> group archive. I
> haven't been able to find any Testing Standards
> besides those
> compiled in the "JUnit Best Practices" article. Are
> there any
> standards for validation or any general standards
> that anyone has
> incorporated in their own projects? The thought
> behind this is by
> alligning everyone into some basic testing standards
> we can document
> the process and use it as a requirements doc.
>

I am facing some problems
